  • Quick-Hit #2: Screen Zoom on your Mac
    Bruce • Jun 10, 2012
    Want to quickly zoom-in on something on your Mac screen? Place your mouse over the area of the screen you want to zoom in on and, while holding the 'control' key, move your mouse Down and watch as your screen zooms in.
